summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the cancellation or abandonment of $17,000.00 of the total appropriation of $85,000.00 from Seattle General Municipal Improvement Bond 1927 Construction Fund, under Ordinance No. 55347, for use in the construction of fieldhouses at Green Lake and Columbia playfields and providing for the transfer of same amount from said Seattle General Municipal Improvement Bonds 1927 Interest and Redemption Fund for payment of interest.
